products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Teal - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity (blackout) teal is a colour that means different things to different people, which is precisely why we believe it should be celebrated at every turn. When you want to be able to reimagine your space in a way that evokes memories, this is a shade that makes it happen. The cross between blues and greens that trinity (blackout) teal provides allows you to unify two of the most sought after areas of the colour spectrum.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Steel Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: The beautiful thing about trinity blackout steel blue is that it allows you to lose yourself in the beautiful world of natural shades and tones. Is it a deep and moody blue? Or is it aqua blue crossed with denim? No one really knows, which means you can make it anything you want. Choosing lighter natural colours is the way to go when you want to enliven your chosen space. Think about ways to add light beiges and gentle stone greys to the mix and you'll instantly fall in love with the end result.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Baby Blue - Roller Blind
products.description: Our new baby blue fabric is already proving to be one of the most popular additions to the trinity blackout collection, and with good reason. It offers a subtle texture that sits gently in the background, adding something that will be appreciated no matter which room you choose to use it in. The wonderful thing about baby blue is that you can use it to set the tone for any number of different creative avenues.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Denim - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity blackout in denim is so much more than a fabric that allows you to get the perfect restful sleep mind and body need. It's a contemporary shade whose texture really brings the colour to life, and allows you to do something a little bit special. We love the idea of hanging denim in the kitchen so that you can turn on the style when it's time to cook up a feast. If you have the option to match it to the tiling then even better, but don't feel like you have to constrain yourself when the time comes to make a change.

products.title: Roma, Aqua Haze - Roller Blind
products.description: The sweet duck egg of roma's aqua haze makes for a lovely accent to any window. The colour really comes into its own when set against the outside sunlight, and it provides privacy without blocking the light out altogether. For some country chic, pair with pretty floral curtains in your dining room or place against white walls and pine units in a kitchen to truly brighten things up. The pale colour also makes this the ideal blind for small utility rooms or bathrooms that don't get a lot of natural light.

products.title: Fortune, Teal - Roller Blind
products.description: The roma in fortune green is a subtle, blue-teal shade with a wonderfully oceanic look to it. Typical of roma fabric, the material is supple yet strong, making for a high quality blind that lasts. Opt for a lovely seaside theme in your bedroom by matching the fortune green to shabby chic accessories, bleached woods, and similar blues and greens. Go one step further and add seashells and coastal pictures too.

products.description: The palate blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric.
